messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] My email account
messages.msgSnippet: I use hotmail.  They are free and I can access my email from anywhere that there is an internet connection. Bonnie ...
messages.messageBody:
I use hotmail. They are free and I can access my email from anywhere that
there is an internet connection.

Bonnie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] My email account
messages.msgSnippet: Yahoo does that.  I use it to email a couple of newsletters I do.  They give you the SMTP.  They are the only ones I have found that I could get that info on.
messages.messageBody:
Yahoo does that. I use it to email a couple of newsletters I do. They give
you the SMTP. They are the only ones I have found that I could get that info
on.
Evelyn
